description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a React application, including definitions for light and dark theme colors, transitions, and responsive design tweaks.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles for the main application container, including text alignment and background color management based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, including layout and background color settings.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, with a color transition effect.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for a button that toggles between light and dark themes, including animations and positioning.
